channel.title: Community on Personal Website for Ted Laderas, PhD

item.title: Fostering a Peer Mentoring Culture
item.description: I realize that it has been an embarrasingly long time since I updated this blog. I had all sorts of grandiose plans for it, and I think my problem was that I was thinking too broad, too pie-in-the-sky. I’m going to try to focus on short and informative blog posts. One of the things that I have been thinking about graduate school is the idea of building a Peer Mentoring culture in our department.
